messages.content:
Write a short, engaging script for an Instagram Reel about CyberSecurity. 
- Tone: educational but fun
- Length: about 30 seconds
- Output must be only spoken text, as if read by a narrator
- Do not include any visual directions, scene descriptions, or camera cuts
- Do not add sound effects or background noises
- End with a clear call to action, like "Follow for more tips!"

IMPORTANT:  
- This output will be sent directly to a text-to-speech system to create an Instagram reel  
- Do not include any emojis  
- Do not hallucinate

mapper.prompt:
A modern, minimalistic, eye-catching illustration about CyberSecurity, designed for an Instagram Reel cover. 
- Vertical format (1024x1792)
- Simple, bold design with high contrast
- Flat style with clean lines, avoiding excessive detail
- A central visual element (e.g., a lock, shield, or hacker silhouette) with a strong, clear focus
- Bright colors and a tech-inspired look that grabs attention
- No text, no logos
â€‹
